definitions.title: epith. gent.
definitions.body: [[בְּנֵי הָעֲנׇק]] long-necked (tall) men, early giant people about Hebron and in Philistia, Enak, Enax, Jos 15:14 (JE) = Ju Jdg 1:20, without art. Nu 13:33 (JE), De 9:2; also ´[[יְלִדַי הָע]] Nu 13:22, Nu 13:28, Jos 15:14 (all JE); called also [[עֲנׇקִים]] long-necks, Enakeim, Jos 14:12, Jos 14:15 (JE), Jos 11:21, Jos 11:22 (D), De 2:10, De 2:11, De 2:21 + Je 47:5 (rd. [[עֲנׇקִים]] for MT [[עִמְקָם]]), and perh. 1Ch 12:16 (v. [[עֵמֶק]] ad fin.); [[בְּנֵי עֲנׇקִים]] 1Ch 1:28 (LXX gi/gantev, cf. Nu 13:33), 1Ch 9:2; [[עֲנׇק]] later (erron.) as eponym. ancestor of Anaḳim Jos 15:13 = [[עֲנוֹק]] Jos 21:11 (both P).—Vid. esp. Mey:ZAW i (1881), 139 GFM:Ju 1:10, 1:20 Che:Ency. Bib. ANAK.
